Activity: Log in to the EHR system and review the day's vaccination schedule.
Set up the vaccination station and ensure all supplies are ready.
Administer influenza vaccinations and document details in the EHR.
Provide patient education on influenza prevention and treatment.
Continue with vaccinations and patient education.
Cross-check EHR entries with physical records for accuracy.
Email @his-1 and @his-2 to discuss any trends noticed in patient responses to vaccinations.
Prepare a summary of the day's vaccinations for the clinical lead (@clinlead-1).
Restock supplies and tidy up the vaccination station.
